00065 const char* MsgSocket::tag_start1 = "BIP/1.0";
00066 const char* MsgSocket::tag_start2 = "\r\n";
00067 const char* MsgSocket::tag_end = "\r\n";
00068 const char* MsgSocket::tag_str = "BIP/1.0 %08x %08x %08x\r\n";
00069 const char* MsgSocket::tag_prepared_hdr = "BIP/1.0                   %08x\r\n";
00070 const char* MsgSocket::tag_prepared_serv = "%08x %08x";
00071 
00072 const int MsgSocket::pid_size = 8;
00073 const int MsgSocket::mid_size = 8;
00074 const int MsgSocket::len_size = 8;
00075 
00076 
00077 const int MsgSocket::tag_end_size = (const int)strlen(MsgSocket::tag_end);
00078 const int MsgSocket::tag_size = (const int)(strlen(tag_start1) + 1 + MsgSocket::pid_size + 1 + MsgSocket::mid_size + 1 + MsgSocket::len_size + strlen(tag_start2));

00084 MsgSocket::MsgSocket(Socket* s) :
00085 #ifdef DEBUG_THREAD
00086     Thread( "MsgSocket" ),
00087 #else
00088     Thread(),
00089 #endif
00090 callbackSyncLinkFct(NULL),
00091 socket(s),
00092 bufferSize(TCP_BUFFER_SIZE),
00093 buffer(NULL),
00094 occupiedSize(0),
00095 connected(true),
00096 start_tag(NULL),
00097 buffer_udp_send(NULL),
00098 kind(TCP_CLIENT_KIND),
00099 SendBuffer(NULL),
00100 service_id(0),
00101 message_id(0),
00102 peer_pid(0),
00103 receivedSyncLinkMsg(false),
00104 sendSyncLinkMsg(false)
00105 {
00106     buffer = new OMISCID_TLM unsigned char[bufferSize+1];                       // +1 for '\0'
00107     SendBuffer = new OMISCID_TLM unsigned char[TCP_BUFFER_SIZE];        // +1 for '\0'
00108 
00109     start_tag = new OMISCID_TLM char[tag_size+1];
00110     SetMaxMessageSizeForTCP(TCP_BUFFER_SIZE-1);
00111 }

00139 MsgSocket::~MsgSocket()
00140 {
00141     // We do not wan to callback anything more...
00142     // Remove the list
00143     RemoveAllCallbackObjects();
00144 
00145     Stop();
00146 
00147     if ( socket )
00148     {
00149         socket->Close();
00150         delete socket;
00151     }
00152 
00153     if( buffer )
00154     {
00155         delete [] buffer;
00156         buffer = NULL;
00157     }
00158     if( buffer_udp_send )
00159     {
00160         delete [] buffer_udp_send;
00161         buffer_udp_send = NULL;
00162     }
00163     if( start_tag )
00164     {
00165         delete [] start_tag;
00166         start_tag = NULL;
00167     }
00168     if ( SendBuffer )
00169     {
00170         delete [] SendBuffer;
00171         SendBuffer = NULL;
00172     }
00173 }

00189 bool MsgSocket::SetSyncLinkData( SimpleString DataForSL )
00190 {
00191     if ( DataForSL.GetLength() <= 0 )
00192         return false;
00193 
00194     SmartLocker SL_protectSend(protectSend);
00195 
00196     if ( receivedSyncLinkMsg == true || sendSyncLinkMsg == true )
00197     {
00198         // TOO LATE
00199 #ifdef DEBUG
00200         if ( Debug & DBG_LINKSYNC )
00201         {
00202             fprintf( stderr, "MsgSocket::SetSyncLinkData: connexion already open. Can not set SyncLink data.\n" );
00203         }
00204 #endif
00205 
00206         return false;
00207     }
00208 
00209     // Copy data and set Length
00210     SyncLinkData = DataForSL;
00211 
00212     return true;
00213 }
00214 
00215 bool MsgSocket::SetPeerSyncLinkData( char* DataForSL, int DataLength )
00216 {
00217     if ( DataForSL == NULL || DataLength <= 0 )
00218         return false;
00219 
00220     SmartLocker SL_protectSend(protectSend);
00221 
00222     if ( PeerSyncLinkData.GetLength() != 0 )
00223     {
00224         // TOO LATE
00225 #ifdef DEBUG
00226         if ( Debug & DBG_LINKSYNC )
00227         {
00228             fprintf( stderr, "MsgSocket::SetPeerSyncLinkData: Peer SyncLink data already set.\n" );
00229         }
00230 #endif
00231         return false;
00232     }
00233 
00234     TemporaryMemoryBuffer Buffer( DataLength+1 );
00235     memcpy( (char*)Buffer, DataForSL, DataLength );
00236     ((char*)Buffer)[DataLength] = '\0';
00237 
00238     PeerSyncLinkData = Buffer;
00239 
00240     return true;
00241 }

00266 int MsgSocket::PrepareBufferForBip(char * buf, const char * data, int datalen, bool OnlyHeader /*= false */)
00267 {
00268     char * Where;
00269 
00270     if ( OnlyHeader == true )
00271     {
00272         // write the len of the buffer
00273         sprintf( buf, tag_prepared_hdr, datalen );
00274 
00275         return (tag_size);
00276     }
00277     // else
00278 
00279     if ( buf == NULL || datalen > maxBIPMessageSize )
00280     {
00281         return -1;
00282     }
00283 
00284     // write the len of the buffer
00285     sprintf( buf, tag_prepared_hdr, datalen );
00286 
00287     // We like to skip the place of the BIP header
00288     Where = buf + tag_size;
00289     // Just copy the data into the Buffer
00290     memmove( Where, data, datalen );
00291     // We need to write the end tag
00292     Where = Where + datalen;
00293     memcpy( Where, tag_end, tag_end_size );
00294 
00295     return (tag_size + datalen + tag_end_size);
00296 }
00297 
00298 int MsgSocket::PrepareBufferForBipFromCuttedMsg(char * buf, int* tab_length, const char** tab_buf, int nb_buf)
00299 {
00300     char * Where;
00301     int TotalLen;
00302     int i;
00303 
00304     if ( tab_length == NULL || tab_buf == NULL || nb_buf <= 0 )
00305     {
00306         return -1;
00307     }
00308 
00309     // Compute the TotalLen of the Buffer
00310     TotalLen = 0;
00311     for( i = 0; i < nb_buf; i++ )
00312     {
00313         TotalLen += tab_length[i];
00314     }
00315 
00316     if ( TotalLen > maxBIPMessageSize )
00317     {
00318         return -1;
00319     }
00320 
00321     // Ok, we have enougth space, start to fill the buffer
00322     // write the begining of the buffer and the len of the buffer
00323     sprintf( buf, tag_prepared_hdr, TotalLen );
00324 
00325     // We like to skip the place of the BIP header
00326     Where = buf + tag_size;
00327 
00328     for( i = 0; i < nb_buf; i++ )
00329     {
00330         // Just copy the data into the Buffer
00331         memmove( Where, tab_buf[i], tab_length[i] );
00332 
00333         // We need to move up to the end of this new part
00334         Where += tab_length[i];
00335     }
00336 
00337     // Now, we put the enbd of the BIP message
00338     memcpy( Where, tag_end, tag_end_size );
00339 
00340     // We compute the len of the full message
00341     return (tag_size + TotalLen + tag_end_size);
00342 }
00343 
00344 
00345 int MsgSocket::WriteHeaderForBip(char * buf, int service_id, int message_id )
00346 {
00347     char * Where;
00348 
00349     if ( buf == NULL )
00350     {
00351         return -1;
00352     }
00353 
00354     Where = buf + strlen(tag_start1) + 1; // Just skip 'BIP/1.0 '
00355     // Print service ID and packet number
00356     sprintf( Where, tag_prepared_serv, service_id, message_id );
00357     // replace the '\0' from the previous printf to the old value : ' '
00358     Where[8+8+1] = ' ';
00359 
00360     return 0;
00361 }

00364 void MsgSocket::InitForTcpClient(const SimpleString addr, int port)
00365 {
00366     socket->Connect(addr, port);
00367     bufferSize = TCP_BUFFER_SIZE;
00368     buffer = new OMISCID_TLM unsigned char[bufferSize+1];       // + 1 for ending '\0'
00369     if ( buffer == NULL )
00370     {
00371         throw MsgSocketException( "Not enougth memory" );
00372     }
00373     SendBuffer = new OMISCID_TLM unsigned char[TCP_BUFFER_SIZE+1];      // + 1 for ending '\0'
00374     if ( SendBuffer == NULL )
00375     {
00376         throw MsgSocketException( "Not enougth memory" );
00377     }
00378     start_tag = new OMISCID_TLM char[tag_size+1];
00379     if ( start_tag == NULL )
00380     {
00381         throw MsgSocketException( "Not enougth memory" );
00382     }
00383     kind = TCP_CLIENT_KIND;
00384     connected = true;
00385     occupiedSize = 0;
00386 }
00387 
00388 void MsgSocket::InitForTcpServer(int port)
00389 {
00390     socket->Bind(SimpleString::EmptyString, port);
00391     socket->Listen();
00392     kind = TCP_SERVER_KIND;
00393     connected = true;
00394 
00395     //   unsigned short port_nb = socket->GetPortNb();
00396     //   char hostname[256];
00397     //   socket->GetHostName(hostname, 256);
00398 
00399     //   printf("Server Connected on : %s:%d", hostname, (int)port_nb);
00400 }

00403 void MsgSocket::InitForUdpExchange(int port)
00404 {
00405     socket->Bind(SimpleString::EmptyString, port);
00406     bufferSize = TCP_BUFFER_SIZE;
00407     buffer = new OMISCID_TLM unsigned char[bufferSize+1];               // +1 for '\0'
00408     buffer_udp_send = new OMISCID_TLM char[UDP_MAX_MSG_SIZE+1]; // +1 for '\0'
00409     kind = UDP_EXCHANGE_KIND;
00410     connected = true;
00411     occupiedSize = 0;
00412 }

00415 bool MsgSocket::AddCallbackObject(MsgSocketCallbackObject * CallbackObject)
00416 {
00417     // lock the list
00418     SmartLocker SL_CallbackObjects(CallbackObjects);
00419 
00420     // Is the Callback object already in the list ?
00421     for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
00422     {
00423         if ( CallbackObjects.GetCurrent() == CallbackObject )
00424         {
00425             // Could not add trice the same listener
00426             return false;
00427         }
00428     }
00429 
00430     // Add the listener
00431     CallbackObjects.Add( CallbackObject );
00432 
00433     return true;
00434 }
00435 
00436 
00440 bool MsgSocket::RemoveCallbackObject(MsgSocketCallbackObject * CallbackObject)
00441 {
00442     // lock the list
00443     SmartLocker SL_CallbackObjects(CallbackObjects);
00444 
00445     // Is the Callback object already in the list ?
00446     for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
00447     {
00448         if ( CallbackObjects.GetCurrent() == CallbackObject )
00449         {
00450             // Found ! Remove it
00451             CallbackObjects.RemoveCurrent();
00452 
00453             // ok, we remove it
00454             return true;
00455         }
00456     }
00457 
00458     // We did not find it
00459     return false;
00460 }
00461 
00462 void MsgSocket::RemoveAllCallbackObjects()
00463 {
00464     // lock the list
00465     SmartLocker SL_CallbackObjects(CallbackObjects);
00466 
00467     // Empty the list
00468     CallbackObjects.Empty();
00469 }

00471 void MsgSocket::SetCallbackSyncLink(Callback_SyncLink cr, void* user_data1, void* user_data2)
00472 {
00473     mutex.Lock();       // Add SL_ as comment in order to prevent false alarm in code checker on locks
00474 
00475     callbackSyncLinkFct = cr;
00476 
00477     callbackSyncLinkData.Msg.len = 0;
00478     callbackSyncLinkData.Msg.buffer = NULL;
00479     callbackSyncLinkData.userData1 = user_data1;
00480     callbackSyncLinkData.userData2 = user_data2;
00481 
00482     mutex.Unlock();     // Add SL_ as comment in order to prevent false alarm in code checker on locks
00483 }
00484 
00485 bool MsgSocket::SendSyncLinkMsg()
00486 {
00487     int TotalLen;
00488 
00489     SmartLocker SL_protectSend(protectSend);
00490 
00491     if ( SyncLinkMsgSent() )
00492     {
00493 #ifdef DEBUG
00494         if ( Debug & DBG_LINKSYNC )
00495         {
00496             fprintf( stderr, "SendSyncLinkMsg: warning SyncLinkMsg already sent.\n" );
00497         }
00498 #endif
00499         return false;
00500     }
00501 
00502     if ( message_id != 0 )
00503     {
00504         fprintf( stderr, "SendSyncLinkMsg: error SyncLinkMsg should be numbered as 0 not %u.\n", message_id );
00505         throw SocketException( "MsgSocket::SendSyncLinkMsg: error SyncLinkMsg should be numbered as 0." );
00506     }
00507 
00508     try
00509     {
00510         if ( SyncLinkData.GetLength() != 0 )
00511         {
00512             TotalLen = PrepareBufferForBip( (char*)SendBuffer, (const char*)SyncLinkData.GetStr(), SyncLinkData.GetLength() );
00513         }
00514         else
00515         {
00516             TotalLen = PrepareBufferForBip( (char*)SendBuffer, "", 0 );
00517         }
00518         if ( TotalLen == -1 )
00519         {
00520             return false;
00521         }
00522 
00523         // We complete the header with a message id = 0
00524         WriteHeaderForBip( (char*)SendBuffer, service_id, message_id );
00525 
00526         message_id++;
00527 
00528 #ifdef DEBUG
00529         if ( Debug & DBG_LINKSYNC )
00530         {
00531             SendBuffer[TotalLen] = '\0';
00532             fprintf( stderr, "SendSyncLinkMsg: %s (%d)\n", SendBuffer, TotalLen );
00533         }
00534 #endif
00535 
00536         if ( (TotalLen = socket->Send(TotalLen, (char*)SendBuffer)) == -1)
00537         {
00538             TotalLen = -1;
00539         }
00540 
00541         sendSyncLinkMsg = true;
00542 
00543         return (TotalLen > 0);
00544     }
00545     catch(SocketException& e)
00546     {
00547         SL_protectSend.Unlock();
00548         OmiscidTrace( "SocketException: %s %d\n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err);
00549         if ( connected )
00550         {
00551             // Send disconnected message
00552             SmartLocker SL_CallbackObjects(CallbackObjects);
00553             // Send info to all listener
00554             for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
00555             {
00556                 try
00557                 {
00558                     CallbackObjects.GetCurrent()->Disconnected(*this, GetPeerPid());
00559                 }
00560                 catch(SocketException&) {} // Discard it
00561             }
00562             connected = false;
00563         }
00564         return false;
00565     }
00566 }
00567 
00568 void FUNCTION_CALL_TYPE MsgSocket::Run()
00569 {
00570     switch (kind)
00571     {
00572     case TCP_SERVER_KIND:
00573         while(connected && !StopPending())
00574         {
00575             //printf("MsgSocket::run : tcp_server loop\n");
00576             AcceptConnection();
00577         }
00578         break;
00579 
00580     case TCP_CLIENT_KIND:
00581         while(connected && !StopPending())
00582         {
00583             //printf("MsgSocket::run : tcp_client loop\n");
00584             Receive();
00585         }
00586         break;
00587 
00588     case UDP_EXCHANGE_KIND:
00589         while(connected && !StopPending())
00590         {
00591             ReceiveUdpExchange();
00592         }
00593         break;
00594 
00595     default:
00596         OmiscidError( "run : unknown type of connection\n");
00597         break;
00598     }
00599 }
00600 
00601 void MsgSocket::Stop()
00602 {
00603     if ( connected )
00604     {
00605         // Send disconnected message
00606         SmartLocker SL_CallbackObjects(CallbackObjects);
00607         // Send info to all listener
00608         for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
00609         {
00610             try
00611             {
00612                 CallbackObjects.GetCurrent()->Disconnected(*this, GetPeerPid());
00613             }
00614             catch(SocketException&) {} // Discard it
00615         }
00616         connected = false;
00617     }
00618     Thread::StopThread(0);
00619 }
00620 
00621 void MsgSocket::Receive()
00622 {
00623     SmartLocker SL_CallbackObjects(CallbackObjects, false);
00624     try
00625     {
00626         if(socket->Select())
00627         {
00628             int nb_read = socket->Recv(bufferSize-occupiedSize, (buffer+occupiedSize));
00629             // OmiscidTrace( "%d %d \n ",nb_read, occupiedSize);
00630             if(nb_read == 0)
00631             {
00632                 if ( connected )
00633                 {
00634                     // Send disconnected message
00635                     SL_CallbackObjects.Lock();
00636                     // Send info to all listener
00637                     for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
00638                     {
00639                         try
00640                         {
00641                             CallbackObjects.GetCurrent()->Disconnected(*this,GetPeerPid());
00642                         }
00643                         catch(SocketException&) {} // Discard it
00644                     }
00645                     SL_CallbackObjects.Unlock();
00646                     connected = false;
00647                 }
00648                 return ;
00649             }
00650             occupiedSize += nb_read;
00651 
00652             // DevOmiscidTrace( "occupiedSize %d\n", occupiedSize );
00653 
00654             // For printing stuff...
00655             buffer[occupiedSize] = '\0';
00656 
00657             bool stop = false;
00658             unsigned int length_msg, pid, mid;
00659             int length_header;
00660 
00661             int offset = 0;
00662             int size = occupiedSize;
00663             while ( connected == true && stop == false )
00664             {
00665                 length_msg = pid = mid = 0;
00666                 if((length_header = GoodBeginning(buffer+offset, size, length_msg, pid, mid)) != 0)
00667                 {
00668                     //cerr << "good beginning ";
00669                     //cerr.write(aBuffer+offset, keyword_min);
00670                     //cerr << endl;
00671                     if ( mid == 0 )
00672                     {
00673 #ifdef DEBUG
00674                         if ( Debug & DBG_LINKSYNC )
00675                         {
00676                             // buffer[offset+offset+length_msg+tag_size] = '\0';
00677                             fprintf( stderr, "MsgSocket::Receive: %s\n", buffer+offset );
00678                         }
00679 #endif
00680                         peer_pid = pid;
00681 
00682                         SmartLocker SL_mutex(mutex);
00683                         if ( callbackSyncLinkFct )
00684                         {
00685                             *(buffer+offset+tag_size+length_msg)='\0';
00686                             callbackSyncLinkData.Msg.len = length_msg;
00687                             if ( length_msg != 0 )
00688                             {
00689                                 callbackSyncLinkData.Msg.buffer =  (char*)buffer+offset+tag_size;
00690                             }
00691                             else
00692                             {
00693                                 callbackSyncLinkData.Msg.buffer =  NULL;
00694                             }
00695                             callbackSyncLinkData.Msg.origine = FromTCP;
00696                             callbackSyncLinkData.Msg.pid = pid;
00697                             callbackSyncLinkData.Msg.mid = mid;
00698                             try
00699                             {
00700                                 (*callbackSyncLinkFct)( &callbackSyncLinkData, this );
00701                             }
00702                             catch( SocketException& e )
00703                             {
00704                                 throw e;
00705                             }
00706                         }
00707                         SL_mutex.Unlock();
00708 
00709                         //std::cout << "Link connexion Msg from "<<pid<<"\n";
00710                         receivedSyncLinkMsg = true;
00711                         if( SyncLinkMsgSent() == false )
00712                         {
00713                             SendSyncLinkMsg();
00714                         }
00715 
00716                         if ( length_msg != 0 )
00717                         {
00718                             SetPeerSyncLinkData( (char*)(buffer+offset+length_header), length_msg );
00719                         }
00720 
00721                         // Let's say we have a new connected peer
00722                         SL_CallbackObjects.Lock();
00723                         // Send info to all listener
00724                         for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
00725                         {
00726                             try
00727                             {
00728                                 CallbackObjects.GetCurrent()->Connected(*this,pid);
00729                             }
00730                             catch(SocketException& e)
00731                             {
00732                                 // Unlock the list
00733                                 SL_CallbackObjects.Unlock();
00734 
00735                                 // Thow the exception
00736                                 throw e;
00737                             }
00738                         }
00739                         SL_CallbackObjects.Unlock();
00740 
00741                         offset += length_header + length_msg + tag_end_size;
00742                         size =  occupiedSize - offset;
00743 
00744                         // Ok, we have someone connected
00745                     }
00746                     //                                  else if(length_msg == 0)
00747                     //                                  {
00748                     //                                          //std::cout << "Empty Msg from "<<pid<<"\n";
00749                     //                                          offset += length_header;
00750                     //                                          size =  occupiedSize - offset;
00751                     //                                  }
00752                     else if ( (unsigned int)size < length_header + length_msg + tag_end_size )
00753                     {
00754                         // OmiscidTrace( "wait more byte\n");
00755                         int total = (int)(length_header + length_msg + tag_end_size);
00756                         if ( total >= bufferSize )
00757                         {
00758                             OmiscidTrace( "buffer too small : new buffer allocation\n");
00759                             //allocation new buffer
00760                             bufferSize = (total+1023)&~1023; // bufferSize = rouded to the KB over
00761                             unsigned char* tmp_buffer = new OMISCID_TLM unsigned char[bufferSize+1];
00762                             if(tmp_buffer)
00763                             {
00764                                 memcpy(tmp_buffer, buffer+offset, size*sizeof(unsigned char));
00765                                 offset = 0;
00766                                 occupiedSize = size;
00767                                 delete [] buffer;
00768                                 buffer = tmp_buffer;
00769                             }
00770                         }
00771                         stop = true;
00772                     }
00773                     else
00774                     {
00775                         offset += length_header;
00776 
00777                         unsigned char* msgptr =  (buffer+offset);
00778 
00779                         //verif end tag
00780                         if( memcmp(tag_end, (msgptr + length_msg), tag_end_size))
00781                         {
00782                             OmiscidTrace( "warning end tag\n");
00783                             size =  occupiedSize - offset;
00784                         }
00785                         else
00786                         {
00787                             offset += length_msg + tag_end_size;
00788                             size =  occupiedSize - offset;
00789 #ifdef DEBUG
00790                             if ( Debug & DBG_RECV )
00791                             {
00792                                 if ( length_msg != 0 )
00793                                 {
00794                                     SimpleString SFormat = "MsgSocket::Recv: %";
00795                                     SFormat += length_msg;
00796                                     SFormat += ".";
00797                                     SFormat += length_msg;
00798                                     SFormat += "s\n";
00799                                     fprintf( stderr, SFormat.GetStr(), msgptr );
00800                                 }
00801                                 else
00802                                 {
00803                                     fprintf( stderr, "MsgSocket::Recv: <empty>\n" );
00804                                 }
00805                             }
00806 #endif
00807                             // Send info to all receiver
00808                             SL_CallbackObjects.Lock();
00809                             if ( CallbackObjects.GetNumberOfElements() )
00810                             {
00811                                 // Prepare data
00812                                 *(msgptr+length_msg)='\0';
00813                                 callbackData.Msg.len = length_msg;
00814                                 if ( length_msg != 0 )
00815                                 {
00816                                     callbackData.Msg.buffer =  (char*)msgptr;
00817                                 }
00818                                 else
00819                                 {
00820                                     callbackData.Msg.buffer =  (char*)NULL;
00821                                 }
00822                                 callbackData.Msg.origine = FromTCP;
00823                                 callbackData.Msg.pid = pid;
00824                                 callbackData.Msg.mid = mid;
00825 
00826                                 // Send info to all listener
00827                                 for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
00828                                 {
00829                                     try
00830                                     {
00831                                         CallbackObjects.GetCurrent()->Receive(*this, callbackData);
00832                                     }
00833                                     catch(SocketException& e)
00834                                     {
00835                                         // Unlock the list
00836                                         SL_CallbackObjects.Unlock();
00837 
00838                                         // Throw the exception
00839                                         throw e;
00840                                     }
00841                                 }
00842                             }
00843                             SL_CallbackObjects.Unlock();
00844                         }
00845                     }
00846                 }
00847                 else
00848                 {
00849                     //cerr << "Decalage\n";
00850                     int dec;
00851                     if(!MoveToMessage(buffer+offset, size, dec))
00852                     {
00853                         stop = true;
00854                         size -= dec;
00855                         offset += dec;
00856                     }
00857                     else
00858                     {
00859                         offset += dec;
00860                         size -= dec;
00861                     }
00862                 }
00863             }
00864             occupiedSize = size;
00865             if ( occupiedSize != 0 && offset != 0 )
00866             {
00867                 memmove(buffer, buffer+offset, occupiedSize);
00868                 // offset is local. It will be set to 0 again.
00869             }
00870         }
00871     }
00872     catch(SocketException& e)
00873     {
00874         OmiscidTrace( "SocketException: %s %d\n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err);
00875         if ( connected )
00876         {
00877             // Send disconnected message
00878             SL_CallbackObjects.Lock();
00879             // Send info to all listener
00880             for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
00881             {
00882                 try
00883                 {
00884                     CallbackObjects.GetCurrent()->Disconnected(*this,GetPeerPid());
00885                 }
00886                 catch(SocketException&) {} // Discard
00887             }
00888             SL_CallbackObjects.Unlock();
00889             connected = false;
00890         }
00891     }
00892 }
00893 
00894 void MsgSocket::AcceptConnection()
00895 {
00896     //std::cerr << "in MsgSocket::acceptConnection\n";
00897     Socket* sock = socket->Accept();
00898     if(sock)
00899     {
00900         AcceptConnection(new MsgSocket(sock));
00901     }
00902 }
00903 
00904 bool MsgSocket::AcceptConnection(MsgSocket* ms)
00905 {
00906     //std::cerr << "in MsgSocket::acceptConnection(MsgSocket*)\n";
00907     delete ms;
00908     return false;
00909 }
00910 
00911 int MsgSocket::Send(int Sendlen, const char* buf)
00912 {
00913     int TotalLen = 0;
00914 
00915     SmartLocker SL_protectSend(protectSend);
00916     try
00917     {
00918         if ( Sendlen > maxBIPMessageSize )
00919         {
00920             int HeaderSend      = 0;
00921             // int BodySend     = 0;
00922             int TailerSend      = 0;
00923             // int ResSend              = 0;
00924 
00925             // OmiscidTrace( "Message too big for one TCP frame (size=%d, sizemax=%d) sends many.\n", Sendlen, maxMessageSizeForTCP);
00926             TotalLen = PrepareBufferForBip( (char*)SendBuffer, NULL, Sendlen, true );
00927             if ( TotalLen == -1 )
00928             {
00929                 SL_protectSend.Unlock();
00930                 return -1;
00931             }
00932 
00933             // We complete the header
00934             WriteHeaderForBip( (char*)SendBuffer, service_id, message_id );
00935 
00936             // Increase the number for the next message
00937             message_id++;
00938 
00939             // Send header
00940             HeaderSend = socket->Send(TotalLen, (char*)SendBuffer);
00941             if ( HeaderSend != TotalLen )
00942             {
00943                 return -1;
00944             }
00945 
00946             // Let's send data...
00947             TotalLen = socket->Send( Sendlen, (char*)(buf) );
00948             if ( TotalLen != Sendlen )
00949             {
00950                 return -1;
00951             }
00952 
00953             TailerSend = socket->Send( tag_end_size, tag_end );
00954             if ( TailerSend != tag_end_size )
00955             {
00956                 return -1;
00957             }
00958 
00959             return HeaderSend + TotalLen + TailerSend;
00960         }
00961 
00962         TotalLen = PrepareBufferForBip( (char*)SendBuffer, buf, Sendlen );
00963         if ( TotalLen == -1 )
00964         {
00965             return -1;
00966         }
00967 
00968         // We complete the header
00969         WriteHeaderForBip( (char*)SendBuffer, service_id, message_id );
00970 
00971         // Increase the number for the next message
00972         message_id++;
00973 
00974         // if ( (TotalLen = socket->Send(TotalLen, (char*)SendBuffer)) == -1)
00975         // {
00976         //      TotalLen = -1;
00977         //}
00978         TotalLen = socket->Send(TotalLen, (char*)SendBuffer);
00979 
00980 #ifdef DEBUG
00981         if ( Debug & DBG_SEND )
00982         {
00983             SendBuffer[TotalLen] = '\0';
00984             fprintf( stderr, "MsgSocket::Send: %s (%d)\n", SendBuffer, TotalLen );
00985         }
00986 #endif
00987 
00988         SL_protectSend.Unlock();
00989         return (TotalLen-tag_end_size-tag_size);
00990     }
00991     catch(SocketException& e)
00992     {
00993         OmiscidTrace( "SocketException: %s %d\n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err);
00994         if ( connected )
00995         {
00996             // Send disconnected message
00997             SmartLocker SL_CallbackObjects(CallbackObjects);
00998             // Send info to all listener
00999             for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
01000             {
01001                 try
01002                 {
01003                     CallbackObjects.GetCurrent()->Disconnected(*this,GetPeerPid());
01004                 }
01005                 catch(SocketException&) {}      // Discard it...
01006             }
01007             connected = false;
01008         }
01009         return -1;
01010     }
01011 }
01012 
01013 int MsgSocket::SendCuttedMsg(int* tab_length, const char** tab_buf, int nb_buf)
01014 {
01015     int i;
01016     int SendLen;
01017     int TotalLen;
01018 
01019     // Compute the len of all buffers
01020     for( SendLen = 0, i = 0; i < nb_buf; i ++ )
01021     {
01022         SendLen += tab_length[i];
01023     }
01024 
01025     SmartLocker SL_protectSend(protectSend);
01026     try
01027     {
01028         if ( SendLen > maxBIPMessageSize )
01029         {
01030             int HeaderSend      = 0;
01031             int BodySend        = 0;
01032             int TailerSend      = 0;
01033             // int ResSend              = 0;
01034 
01035             // OmiscidTrace( "Message too big for one TCP frame (size=%d, sizemax=%d) sends many.\n", SendLen, maxMessageSizeForTCP);
01036 
01037             // prepare buffer
01038             TotalLen = PrepareBufferForBip( (char*)SendBuffer, NULL, SendLen, true );
01039             if ( TotalLen == -1 )
01040             {
01041                 return -1;
01042             }
01043 
01044             // We complete the header
01045             WriteHeaderForBip( (char*)SendBuffer, service_id, message_id );
01046 
01047             // Increase the number for the next message
01048             message_id++;
01049 
01050             // Send header
01051             HeaderSend = socket->Send(TotalLen, (char*)SendBuffer);
01052 
01053             if ( HeaderSend != TotalLen )
01054             {
01055                 return -1;
01056             }
01057 
01058             // Send all parts of the message
01059             for( i = 0; i < nb_buf; i ++ )
01060             {
01061                 TotalLen = socket->Send( tab_length[i], tab_buf[i] );
01062 
01063                 if ( TotalLen == SOCKET_ERROR )
01064                 {
01065                     return -1;
01066                 }
01067 
01068                 BodySend += TotalLen;
01069             }
01070 
01071             // Send end of the message
01072             TailerSend = socket->Send( tag_end_size, tag_end );
01073             if ( TailerSend == -1 )
01074             {
01075                 return -1;
01076             }
01077 
01078             return HeaderSend + BodySend + TailerSend;
01079         }
01080 
01081 
01082         TotalLen = PrepareBufferForBipFromCuttedMsg( (char*)SendBuffer, tab_length, tab_buf, nb_buf);
01083         if ( TotalLen == -1 )
01084         {
01085             return -1;
01086         }
01087         // We complete the header
01088         WriteHeaderForBip( (char*)SendBuffer, service_id, message_id );
01089 
01090 #ifdef DEBUG
01091         if ( Debug & DBG_SEND )
01092         {
01093             OmiscidTrace( "MsgSocket::SendPreparedBuffer %s\n", SendBuffer );
01094         }
01095 #endif
01096 
01097         // Increase the number for the next message
01098         ++message_id;
01099 
01100         if ( (TotalLen = socket->Send(TotalLen, (char*)SendBuffer)) == -1)
01101         {
01102             TotalLen = -1;
01103         }
01104         return TotalLen;
01105     }
01106     catch(SocketException& e)
01107     {
01108         OmiscidTrace( "SocketException: %s %d\n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err);
01109         if ( connected )
01110         {
01111             // Send disconnected message
01112             SmartLocker SL_CallbackObjects(CallbackObjects);
01113             // Send info to all listener
01114             for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
01115             {
01116                 try
01117                 {
01118                     CallbackObjects.GetCurrent()->Disconnected(*this, GetPeerPid());
01119                 }
01120                 catch(SocketException&) {} // Discard it
01121             }
01122             connected = false;
01123         }
01124         SL_protectSend.Unlock();
01125         return -1;
01126     }
01127 }
01128 
01129 int MsgSocket::	SendPreparedBuffer(int len, char* l_buffer)
01130 {
01131     if(l_buffer == NULL)
01132     {
01133         OmiscidError( "SendPreparedBuffer : NULL mesg\n" );
01134         throw MsgSocketException("Message NULL for TCP");
01135     }
01136 
01137     if(len > maxMessageSizeForTCP)
01138     {
01139         OmiscidError( "Message too big for TCP (size=%d, sizemax=%d) so not sended.\n", len, maxMessageSizeForTCP);
01140         throw MsgSocketException("Message too big for TCP");
01141     }
01142 
01143     SmartLocker SL_protectSend(protectSend);
01144     try
01145     {
01146         // Here we've got a full buffer and we can (must) write our header at the in at the beginning !
01147         WriteHeaderForBip(l_buffer, service_id, message_id );
01148 #ifdef DEBUG
01149         if ( Debug & DBG_SEND )
01150         {
01151             OmiscidTrace( "MsgSocket::SendPreparedBuffer %s\n", l_buffer );
01152         }
01153 #endif
01154 
01155         message_id++;
01156 
01157         //socket->Send(strlen(start_tag), start_tag);
01158         int res;
01159         if((res = socket->Send(len, l_buffer)) != -1)
01160         {
01161             return res;
01162         }
01163         OmiscidTrace( "Erreur Send (-1)\n" );
01164         return -1;
01165 
01166     }
01167     catch(SocketException& e)
01168     {
01169         OmiscidTrace( "SocketException: %s %d\n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err);
01170         if ( connected )
01171         {
01172             // Send disconnected message
01173             SmartLocker SL_CallbackObjects(CallbackObjects);
01174             // Send info to all listener
01175             for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
01176             {
01177                 try
01178                 {
01179                     CallbackObjects.GetCurrent()->Disconnected(*this, GetPeerPid());
01180                 }
01181                 catch(SocketException&) {} // Discard it
01182             }
01183             connected = false;
01184         }
01185         return -1;
01186     }
01187 }
01188 
01189 int MsgSocket::SendTo(int len, const char* buf, UdpConnection* dest)
01190 {
01191     //   OmiscidTrace( "in MsgSocket::SendTo\n");
01192     //   OmiscidTrace( "send to pid : %u\n", dest->pid);
01193     if(len > UDP_MAX_MSG_SIZE){
01194         OmiscidError( "Message too big for UDP size=%d,  sizemax=%d\n", len, UDP_MAX_MSG_SIZE);
01195         throw MsgSocketException("Message too big for UDP");
01196     }
01197 
01198     SmartLocker SL_protectSend(protectSend);
01199     if ( buffer_udp_send == NULL )
01200     {
01201         buffer_udp_send = new OMISCID_TLM char[UDP_MAX_MSG_SIZE+1];     // +1 for '\0'
01202         if ( buffer_udp_send == NULL )
01203         {
01204             return 0;
01205         }
01206     }
01207     try
01208     {
01209         struct sockaddr_in* destptr = &(dest->addr);
01210 
01211         unsigned int total = tag_size+len+tag_end_size;
01212 
01213         sprintf(buffer_udp_send, tag_str, service_id, message_id, len);
01214         ++message_id;
01215         sprintf((buffer_udp_send+total-tag_end_size), "%s", tag_end);
01216         memcpy(buffer_udp_send+tag_size, buf, len);
01217 
01218         int TotalLen = socket->SendTo(total, buffer_udp_send, destptr);
01219         return TotalLen;
01220 
01221         //        socket->SendTo(strlen(start_tag), start_tag, destptr);
01222         //        socket->SendTo(len, buf, destptr);
01223         //        socket->SendTo(tag_end_size, tag_end, destptr);
01224     }
01225     catch(SocketException& e)
01226     {
01227         OmiscidTrace( "SocketException: %s %d \n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err);
01228         if ( connected )
01229         {
01230             // Send disconnected message
01231             SmartLocker SL_CallbackObjects(CallbackObjects);
01232             // Send info to all listener
01233             for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
01234             {
01235                 try
01236                 {
01237                     CallbackObjects.GetCurrent()->Disconnected(*this,GetPeerPid());
01238                 }
01239                 catch(SocketException&) {} // Discard it
01240             }
01241             connected = false;
01242         }
01243         return -1;
01244     }
01245 }
01246 
01247 int MsgSocket::GoodBeginning(unsigned char* buf, int len, unsigned int& lengthmsg, unsigned int& pid, unsigned int& mid)
01248 {
01249     if(len < tag_size)
01250     {
01251         //cerr << "longueur insuffisante\n";
01252         return 0;
01253     }
01254     else
01255     {
01256         if ( sscanf((char*)buf, tag_str, &pid, &mid, &lengthmsg) != 3 )
01257         {
01258             //cerr << "different\n";
01259             return 0;
01260         }
01261         else
01262         {
01263             return tag_size;
01264         }
01265     }
01266 }
01267 
01268 bool MsgSocket::MoveToMessage(unsigned char* buf, int len, int& decal)
01269 {
01270     if(len < tag_size)
01271     {
01272         decal = 0;
01273         return false;
01274     }
01275     else
01276     {
01277         int i =0;
01278         while(i < len - tag_size
01279             && (memcmp(tag_start1, (buf+i), strlen(tag_start1)))
01280             /*&& (memcmp(tag_start2, (buf+i+tag_size-2), strlen(tag_start2)))*/)
01281         {
01282             ++i;
01283         }
01284         decal = i;
01285         return (i != len - tag_size);
01286     }
01287 }
01288 
01289 
01290 UdpConnection* MsgSocket::AcceptConnection(const UdpConnection& udp_connect, bool msg_empty)
01291 {
01292     OmiscidTrace( "AcceptConnection UDP (2)\n");
01293     if(msg_empty)
01294     {
01295         OmiscidTrace( "[Empty Msg]\n");
01296     }
01297     OmiscidTrace( "\n");
01298     return NULL;
01299 }
01300 
01301 void MsgSocket::ReceiveUdpExchange()
01302 {
01303     SmartLocker SL_CallbackObjects(CallbackObjects, false);
01304     try
01305     {
01306         if(socket->Select())
01307         {
01308 
01309             //std::cerr << "in ReceiveUdpServer\n";
01310             int nb_read = socket->Recv(bufferSize-occupiedSize, (buffer+occupiedSize), &udpConnection.addr);
01311             //std::cerr << "nb_read=" << nb_read <<"\n";
01312             if(nb_read == 0)
01313             {
01314                 return ;
01315             }
01316 
01317             UdpConnection* connection = NULL;
01318 
01319             occupiedSize += nb_read;
01320 
01321             bool stop = false;
01322             unsigned int length_msg;
01323             int length_header;
01324             int offset = 0;
01325             int size = occupiedSize;
01326             unsigned int pid, mid;
01327             while(!stop)
01328             {
01329                 if((length_header = GoodBeginning(buffer+offset, size, length_msg, pid, mid)) != 0)
01330                 {
01331                     //cerr << "good beginning ";
01332                     //cerr.write(aBuffer+offset, keyword_min);
01333                     //cerr << endl;
01334                     udpConnection.pid = pid;
01335                     // REVIEW a changer pour UDP
01336                     //    if(mid == 0)
01337                     //          {
01338                     //            peer_pid = pid;
01339                     //            offset += length_header;
01340                     //            connection = AcceptConnection(udpConnection, true);
01341                     //          }
01342                     //    else
01343                     if((unsigned int)size < length_header + length_msg + tag_end_size)
01344                     {
01345                         stop = true;
01346                     }
01347                     else
01348                     {
01349                         connection = AcceptConnection(udpConnection, false);
01350                         offset += length_header;
01351                         unsigned char* msgptr =  (buffer+offset);
01352 
01353 
01354                         //verif end tag
01355                         if(memcmp(tag_end, (msgptr + length_msg), tag_end_size))
01356                         {
01357                             OmiscidTrace( "warning end tag\n");
01358                             //ignore message, search for new header after the detected header
01359                             size =  occupiedSize - offset;
01360                         }
01361                         else
01362                         {
01363                             offset += length_msg + tag_end_size;
01364                             size =  occupiedSize - offset;
01365                             if(length_msg != 0)
01366                             {
01367                                 SL_CallbackObjects.Lock();
01368                                 if( connection && CallbackObjects.GetNumberOfElements() )
01369                                 {
01370                                     *(msgptr+length_msg)='\0';
01371                                     callbackData.Msg.len = length_msg;
01372                                     callbackData.Msg.buffer =  (char*)msgptr;
01373                                     callbackData.Msg.origine = FromUDP;
01374                                     callbackData.Msg.pid = pid;
01375                                     callbackData.Msg.mid = mid;
01376                                     for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
01377                                     {
01378                                         try
01379                                         {
01380                                             CallbackObjects.GetCurrent()->Receive(*this, callbackData);
01381                                         }
01382                                         catch(SocketException& e)
01383                                         {
01384                                             // Unlock the list
01385                                             SL_CallbackObjects.Unlock();
01386 
01387                                             // Throw the exception
01388                                             throw e;
01389                                         }
01390                                     }
01391                                 }
01392                                 SL_CallbackObjects.Unlock();
01393                             }
01394 
01395                         }
01396                     }
01397                 }
01398                 else
01399                 {
01400                     //cerr << "Decalage\n";
01401                     int dec;
01402                     if(!MoveToMessage(buffer+offset, size, dec))
01403                     {
01404                         stop = true;
01405                         size -= dec;
01406                         offset += dec;
01407                     }
01408                     else
01409                     {
01410                         offset += dec;
01411                         size -= dec;
01412                     }
01413                 }
01414             }
01415             occupiedSize = size;
01416             if ( occupiedSize != 0 && offset != 0 )
01417             {
01418                 memmove(buffer, buffer+offset, occupiedSize);
01419             }
01420         }
01421     }
01422     catch(SocketException& e)
01423     {
01424         OmiscidTrace( "SocketException: %s %d\n", e.msg.GetStr(), e.err);
01425         if ( connected )
01426         {
01427             // Send disconnected message
01428             SL_CallbackObjects.Lock();
01429             // Send info to all listener
01430             for( CallbackObjects.First(); CallbackObjects.NotAtEnd(); CallbackObjects.Next() )
01431             {
01432                 try
01433                 {
01434                     CallbackObjects.GetCurrent()->Disconnected(*this,GetPeerPid());
01435                 }
01436                 catch(SocketException&) {} // Discard it
01437             }
01438             SL_CallbackObjects.Unlock();
01439             connected = false;
01440         }
01441     }
01442 }

01449 const struct sockaddr_in* UdpConnection::getAddr() const
01450 {
01451     return &addr;

01453 
01454 bool UdpConnection::operator==(const UdpConnection& udp_connect) const
01455 {
01456     return !memcmp(&addr, udp_connect.getAddr(), sizeof(struct sockaddr));
01457 }

01482 }
01483 
01484 bool MsgSocket::ReceivedSyncLinkMsg()
01485 {
01486     bool tmpb;
01487     SmartLocker SL_protectSend(protectSend);
01488 
01489     tmpb = receivedSyncLinkMsg;
01490 
01491     return tmpb;
01492 }
01493 
01499 bool MsgSocket::WaitSyncLinkMsg(unsigned int TimeToWait/* = 250 */)
01500 {
01501     ElapsedTime CountWaitedTime;
01502     while( connected == true )
01503     {
01504         if ( ReceivedSyncLinkMsg() )
01505         {
01506             return true;
01507         }
01508         if ( CountWaitedTime.Get() >= TimeToWait )
01509         {
01510             return false;
01511         }
01512         Thread::Sleep(10);
01513     }
01514     return false;
01515 }
01516 
01517 bool MsgSocket::SyncLinkMsgSent() const
01518 {
01519     return sendSyncLinkMsg;
01520 }

01522 int MsgSocket::GetMaxMessageSizeForTCP() const
01523 {
01524     return maxMessageSizeForTCP;
01525 }
01526 
01527 void MsgSocket::SetMaxMessageSizeForTCP(int max)
01528 {
01529     if ( max <= 0 )
01530         return;
01531 
01532     if ( max > TCP_BUFFER_SIZE-1 )
01533     {
01534         maxMessageSizeForTCP = TCP_BUFFER_SIZE-1;
01535     }
01536     else
01537     {
01538         maxMessageSizeForTCP = max;
01539     }
01540     maxBIPMessageSize = maxMessageSizeForTCP - tag_size - tag_end_size;
01541 }

01543 bool MsgSocket::operator==(unsigned int peer_id) const
01544 {
01545     return peer_pid == peer_id;
01546 }
